snippet.title: Faeria Launch Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Faeria is the next generation of card game, a PC card battler perfected for mobile.

Play now on Steam and iPad: https://www.faeria.com/play

Faeria's gameplay combines core Card Game values together with a Living Board, giving our players the ability to shape the battlefield as they play, creating mind-blowing strategies. Each game of Faeria is not only unique, beautiful and fast-paced but also highly competitive.

After a year in Early Access, Faeria's release version was launched on March 8th 2017. After years of hard work, dedication and love, Faeria has evolved into the game we always new it could be!

Free now on Steam and App Store for iPad, coming soon to iPhone and Android devices!
